pros: Great pay- higher than most similar companies. Great management who you can get a hold of anytime you need.
cons: Understaffed at times. Insurance could be cheaper.

job_title: Director of Residential Services in Washington, IL
pros: Autonomy and opportunity to use skills.
cons: 24/7-365 days per year! There is a lot of responsibility, typical of a role in healthcare.

job_title: Direct Support Professional (DSP) in Ontario, CA
cons: Ministry changes ,you need to except change or you will be frustrated

job_title: Certified Nursing Assistant CNA in Decatur, IL
cons: Administrators, schedule was often done incorrectly with days off scheduled to work, etc. mostly the administration was the biggest con of this facility- their attitudes towards CNA's were often condescending and rude.

job_title: Licensed Practical Nurse in Joplin, MO
cons: I really can’t think of any.

review_title: It was a great place to work. Majority of the staff was friendly and helpful
job_title: CNA/Care Giver in Crown Point, IN
pros: Friendly staff. Outgoing and helpful. We were like a team and a family we worked together to get our job done
cons: Either short staffed or over staffed. The staff that have been there forever are a bit mouthy and say whatever they want
